projects.title: Ambition
projects.description: It is a platform for launching NFT collection, to create the simplest way to launch an NFT collectio. Compatible with the world's most popular blockchains Ethereum, Polygon and Solana. Creators can either build a custom minting website with Ambition, or use our embedded minting button with their existing website builder. Creators can set the whitelist holders easily with our no-code tool. This way, it helps the creators to plan out their pre-sale phase smoothly. Creators can set both pre-sale and public sale dates easily from our dashboard. Creators can set delayed or instant reveals on their NFT collection sale.

projects.title: Cardmoola
projects.description: It is a platform for buying/selling gift cards and exchanging them for money that gets credited to the wallet. Integration with 3rd party (e-gifter) to buy cards, make payment using apple-pay, google-pay, paypal and authorize.net. Schedule gift carddelivery. Users can view order history, update the card details or payment methods and billing addresses. Users also entitled to cashback on every purchase, they can view the cashback balance and transactions. One can also refer a friend to earn joining bonus. There is a provision and campaign for influencers to invite new users and earn bonus. Sift console integration to run severa;l workflows and minimize fraudulent activities.

projects.title: Marijuana Doctors
projects.description: As marijuana is legalized in several states of America, so thus the dispensaries offering cure. Thus this project is solely responsible for managing the dispensaries and patients and their appointments with the associated doctors.

projects.title: Listing loop
projects.description: Gives buyers access to properties for sale that aren't always advertised on the major sites. Buyers can now discover properties for sale from all real estateagencies in the one convenient place.

projects.title: Gather Our Memories
projects.description: It is a platform, where Funeral Homes create new Cases for the deceased Persons. These Cases are then accessed by the loved one's family members and perform tasks such as: writing the obituary, scheduling funeral events, generating the contracts and so on.

projects.title: Fresh Pos-Dry Cleaning
projects.description: This application provides ease to the store owners, customers and drivers. Here store owners are the owners taking care of Dry-Cleaning stores. Customers are the people, who get their clothes cleaned and Drivers are the people responsible for all the transits.

projects.title: Brokersumo
projects.description: Managing Commissions, Back Office And Accounting for Real Estate Brokerages And Agent Teams and On boarding new agents, managing and processing agents monthly billings, customizing commission plans and closing fees.
